	High level of professionalism, excellent attitude, integrity, and discretion in handling confidential information.
	Proactive and results-oriented approach that supports executive productivity and organizational efficiency.

Social Impact & CSR

Organizational Structure & Policy Development

	Strong ability to link HR deliverables to revenue, profit, and business outcomes.
	Demonstrated expertise in performance management and KPI development.
	Excellent leadership, communication, and digital HR capabilities.
	Experience in building HR systems, corporate policies, and organizational structures.


Qualification:


	B.Sc in Business Administration (required)
